name: Knock 'Em
description:
A simple endless game by Eike Kreisel and Leon Arndt for Coding Blocks Game Jam '22

Knock 'em is a very simple and silly game about knocking pins over until the police pins catch you. We hope you have fun! One round takes 1-2 minutes to play.

Controls

WASD or Arrow keys to move

The game can be quit by pressing Escape after losing

Theme

We tried to take the theme of "It’s following me" to mean that the player follows the pins while some follows also follow the player: the theme has two meanings in our game.

Thank you

Thank you to Coding Blocks for organizing, we had a lot of fun working on the game with the theme. Comments and feedback is always appreciated!

Easter Eggs

We have hidden some easter eggs in the game, try to find them all!
